name: api_servers_cancel_service
desc:
This Function Applies to the Dedicated Servers services.
Cancels a service for the passed module matching the passed id.  Canceling a service will also cancel any addons for that service at the same time.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

id.name: id
id.description: ID / Service ID you wish to cancel
